title: Pussy So Good

That pussy so good, so good

Nigga, you ain’t lyin’

Rand and watch filled with rocks, watch
[Hook]
That pussy so good, so good
A nigga so hood, so hood
Nigga, you ain’t lyin’

Hold up, I started to see shit I couldn’t see

[Hook]
That pussy so good, so good
